Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, but considering its importance to you, I am confident it will serve you well. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, aiming to provide you with an opportunity to acquire something truly remarkable without exceeding your budget. I trust that this offer will allow us both to benefit from this unique transaction. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
